â€œThis strain makes your problems go away.

Not one for doing stuff on but I guess you could if you really had to.

column3: â€œI smoke this strain..what a high!! 100% relaxed on the bed..but not sleepy. Not the best taste but the smoke is too sweet with citrus influence. This strain fucked me, shit..real mental trip. Moreover, i had very very dry eyes..RED EYES. One of my favourite strains..five stars!â€

â€œNice strain, definite 5 star quality. This has a hazy fruity aftertaste that burns really nicely. Really relaxing strain that can still carry a nice body heaviness to go with the mental lightness it also provides.â€
